features: 👨‍💻 Still can't focus due to sedentary stress? This pressure relief seat cushion for tailbone pain relief with wrapping design provides full support to evenly distribute pressure on the tailbone and hips caused by sedentary. Contoured design supports the thighs and buttocks, perfectly fitting the curve of the but tocks and aligning the entire spine with its natural position to promote healthy posture. It also improves blood flow so you can stay relaxed and focused on your work, driving or travel with no pressure.

💪 Why not choose a painless cushion? If you are sedentary and suffer from sciatica, tailbone, lower back, lumbar, waist, hip, spinal pain, thigh numbness and other problems caused by sedentary activities, our seat cushion for tailbone hip pain relief is the best choice for you! Unique heart-shaped hollow US patented ergonomics design helps with herniated discs, post-operative injuries, coccyx injuries, pregnancy pain and hemorrhoid suffering to give you a pain-free sitting experience.

🧽 Do you know anything about memory foam? The core of this memory foam seat cushion is made of slow-rebound, high-quality memory foam that will not deform after use. Memory foam conforms to your curves by adjusting its shape to your posture. And coccyx seat cushion is both soft and supportive to provide you with ultimate comfort and effective support. All materials used in the car seat cushions for driving back pain are certified safe without any additives or harmful chemicals to human health.

💼 Need a multi-purpose cushion? Our chair cushion is portable, durable and conveniently sized to fit most types of chairs. So the office chair cushion is great for office chair, dinning chair, gaming chair, car seat, wheelchair, airplane seat, race stand seats and mobility scooter. Always letting you sit comfortably. You can also use the office chair se at cushion to add height to your chair to make it fit you better.

🧼 Still worried about the cushions getting dirty? Our coccyx pillow sciatica pillow feature a breathable black mesh soft pillow case to allow air to circulation and prevent sedentary sweating. Cushion cover is removable and machine washableso the but t pillow chair pad can be clean easily. The non-slip bottom of this chair cushion keeps it stably in place on your chair to prevents sliding off while sitting

🎁 Are you picking out gifts? LOOK OVER HERE! If you need an amazing and practical gift, then you can choose this coccyx cushion for tailbone pain. The office chair pillow can be used as a Christmas gift, Thanksgiving gift, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day gift, Birthday gift for your often sedentary boss, colleagues, families, friends and everyone else you love to give them a comfortable and thoughtful gift.

🛒 Want to experience a hassle-free shopping? Your shopping experience is our first priority. If you have any dissatisfaction, please contact us as soon as possible. We will reply your email within 24 hours to help you solve the problem. In addition, if you feel that the donut pillow for tailbone pain sitting pillow is not suitable for you, we will offer you a full refund without any hassle. Wish you have a pleasant shopping experience!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give You the Ultimate Sitting Experience The memory foam seat cushion turns all chairs into premium seating, giving your hips and legs the right amount of support for a comfortable sedentary experience!
The contours of the cushion perfectly fit the body's curves and spread the pressure evenly, thus regulating your sitting posture and keeping your spine in a natural position.

Are you and your loved ones suffering from the pain that comes with being sedentary? This sciatica cushion is a must-have for sedentary people, as it relieves numbness in the limbs and pain in the tailbone brought about by sedentary behavior, so that you still feel relaxed even after sitting for eight hours.

Perfect Meaningful Caring Gift If you still don’t know what gift to choose on Wedding Day, Housewarming, New Year's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas etc. This PAIN RELIEF SEAT CUSHION will be your perfect gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My butt pillow
reviews.reviewText: I love my new pillow it helps my back and my legs thank you very much My Boyfriend loved it too had to buy another one for him lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This item replaced an ordinary chair cushion and the difference is AMAZING!
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a seat cushion in my computer chair...this item is MUCH more comfortable...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be a bit higher
reviews.reviewText: Good cushioning and memory foam. Firm and supportive. If I could do anything, I would have it be a little less wide so it fits better into my bucket type office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try them out!
reviews.reviewText: These dryer balls actually work surprisingly well at keeping clothes untangled and wrinkle free. Not sure how but it works. If you leave your clothes in the dryer overnight or for days on end, they’ll still be wrinkled but that’s user error and has nothing to do with the dryer balls. I’d recommend giving them a shot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: Bought this based on the reviews and am somewhat disappointed. First it’s not as thick as one would imagine it to be. Especially with memory foam it doesn’t offer that much comfort for what it’s worth. I’ll be returning it as I am seeking something more plush and with more of a cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars QUIET DRYER BALLS
reviews.reviewText: Helps speed drying and acts like a fabric softener without using chemicals. Safe for all dry-able fabrics. I have not tried adding scented oils to balls. They are SO MUCH quieter than the plastic drier balls I had which when they became old actually ruined some curtains I was drying because of unseen sharp edges. I love these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alternative to dryer sheets
reviews.reviewText: These dryer balls are a fantastic alternative to dryer sheets. Though not quite as wrinkle-free or soft as with a sheet, they are a welcome product because they are better for the environment and air quality. I use essential oils on the dryer balls, which make for a wonderful scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to dryer sheets!
reviews.reviewText: Read about these and thought I would try them. They work great and will save money and less waste!

Vraiment confortable et moelleux. Moi qui fait un travail de bureau, ça rend mes journée moins pénibles. Terminée les douleurs au bas du dos et surtout au fessier. Malgré la grande qualité de ma chaise, elle sont toujours assez rigide pour le fessier. Ce coussin règle ce problème de taille et permet le confort mérité.
Super comfortable. Thick, and well made. Durable.

reviews.reviewTitle: well made, gives support but get uncomfortable after longer use.
reviews.reviewText: this is well made and a good size for my bottom, and gives support and doesnt get flattened completely even though im big and heavy. I tried it on a few different chairs over a few days and ended up removing it. I really liked it and it was very comfortable at first but after a while it feels like youre sitting on something rather than feeling part of the chair, would be the best way to describe it. it also adds an inch or so when sitting and as an already tall and large person this can make it harder to slide the chair under a tabletop, or if height non-adjustable it can make the chair too high or less comfortable.
